702082f-b.text:
1950 West Farms Road, south of the souteast corner of E. Tremont Avenue, showing the Crowther Mansion, built-1816. It later became part of the bleachery works located here.
Views 1,2  about 1915
View 3: E. P. Chrystie  April 16, 1927
702082f-b.folder: 1950 West Farms Road & Tremont Avenue (East)., Bronx, NY
702082f-b.original_title: Bronx: 1950 West Farms Road - Tremont Avenue (East).
